scripts.build: rm -rf build dist src && mkdir build && npm-run-all build:* after
scripts.build:1: cp -r src1 src && parcel build src/index.html src/profile.html && mv dist build/1; rm -rf src dist
scripts.build:2: cp -r src2 src && parcel build src/index.html src/profile.html && mv dist build/2; rm -rf src dist
